testcase.name: Contact us Feature in PUP Site - PUP Contact us
testcase.system-out: Given def step0 = 'Using Chrome as a browser' ............................. passed * configure driver = {type:'chromedriver', executable: 'C:/Program Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chromedriver.exe'} . passed And def step1 = 'Browser navigates to PUP search website' ................. passed * driver 'https://www.pup.edu.ph' ......................................... passed And def step2 = 'Maximize Browser' ........................................ passed * driver.maximize() ....................................................... passed And def step3 = 'Wait the document until complete' ........................ passed * waitUntil("document.readyState == 'complete'") .......................... passed And def step4 = 'User click Applicant button' ............................. passed * click('{^a}Applicant') .................................................. passed When def step5 = 'User click Contact us' .................................. passed * click('{^a}Contact us') ................................................. passed Then def step6 = 'User expected result should display the output in the website' . passed * waitForUrl('https://www.pup.edu.ph/about/contactus') .................... passed
